articles.description: Liverpool thrash Sparta Prague at Anfield to complete a resounding aggregate victory as they move into the quarter-finals of the Europa League.
articles.title: Liverpool thrash Sparta to reach last eight

articles.description: Captain Jamie George says England have reviewed footage of last year's record home defeat by France as they prepare to enact revenge in the Six Nations.
articles.title: England have watched record France defeat - George

articles.description: Galopin Des Champs bids to defend the Cheltenham Gold Cup on Friday for record-breaking trainer Willie Mullins as the big race marks its 100th anniversary.
articles.title: Cheltenham Gold Cup: Galopin Des Champs, Fastorslow, Corach Rambler among runners

articles.description: Banned Russian figure skater Kamila Valieva was given 56 medications, nutritional and dietary supplements, the Court of Arbitration for Sport reveals.
articles.title: Kamila Valieva: Russian figure skater given 56 medications and supplements over two years

articles.description: Inter Miami head coach Gerardo Martino says Lionel Messi will likely miss their next game against DC United after the forward picked up a leg injury against Nashville.
articles.title: Injured Messi likely to miss Inter Miami’s next game - Martino

articles.description: Rangers' Europa League campaign crashes to an end after Rafa Silva's breakaway goal proves decisive to send Benfica into the quarter-finals after another thrilling encounter at Ibrox.
articles.title: Rangers out of Europe after defeat by Benfica

articles.description: Head coach Gregor Townsend knows Scotland need their best performance of the season to topple Ireland in Dublin on Saturday.
articles.title: Scotland need 'something special' for Ireland trip

articles.description: Aston Villa defeat Ajax at a raucous Villa Park to move into the Europa Conference League quarter-finals.
articles.title: Aston Villa thrash Ajax to move into quarter-finals

articles.description: Luke Humphries completes back-to-back night victories and replaces Michael van Gerwen at the top of the Premier League table.
articles.title: Premier League Darts: Luke Humphries wins night seven in Nottingham

articles.description: Rory McIlroy shares the early first-round lead with Xander Schauffele in the Players Championship after a seven-under-par 65 at Sawgrass.
articles.title: Players Championship: Rory McIlroy shares early Sawgrass lead after a 65
